name: I Want to Summon a Hot Demon but My Power Level is Too Low so the Portal is Unstable
name_original: I Want to Summon a Hot Demon but My Power Level is Too Low so the Portal is Unstable
description:
Get ready for some amazing demon summoning action.

Features

 - Perform repetitive tasks in order to keep the portal open!

 - Test your obedience in being assigned random tasks.

 - 7 Total Demons to summon?????? Can you summon them all???

 - PNG of a witch girl in the corner, pretend it's animated

- 1 original composition????
